analysis.description:
INonStandardERC20 (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#432-449) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#446-447)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#447-449)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#449)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#587)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in BancorConverter.buy (/unique_chucks/10/0x9dce7c9767863110e4fa01410a35b5471aece64e.sol#1247-1272):
